channel.title: The Thrive Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: A discussion of the latest news portaining to Thrive!
channel.itunes:author: The Revolutionary Games Team
channel.itunes:summary: The Thrive Podcast is a Podcast highlighting the new and exciting changes in the Thrive project.
channel.description:
The Thrive Podcast is a Podcast highlighting the new and exciting changes in the Thrive project. We talk to programmers and leaders in the project and see what's new! Check back every few weeks and see what's changed!
Revolutionary Games , , and

item.title: Episode 1: The Beginning
item.itunes:author: Revolutionary Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Introduction, website, music and toxin news.
item.itunes:summary: This episode we introduce the Thrive Podcast, get an update on the website from Jacob, hear about art from Cheese, hear some music from Oliver, latest version updates from Daniferrito, a compound update from Seregon and a toxin breifing from ~sciocont.

item.title: Episode 2: Questions, Answers and Progress
item.itunes:author: Revolutionary Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Q&A, Microbe Progress, and Music.
item.itunes:summary: This episode we go through some Q&A with the whole team, some cell editor news from ~sciocont, music updates from Oliver, and an engine specification from Daniferrito.
